amendment.description: Amendment sought to reprogram already appropriated funds to create an Office of Good Jobs for the Department of Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 357).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 357).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ellison.
